contexts.context: Harithoel <mark>watched</mark> S'Riizh's futile endeavor for a little while before getting to work...
...not my weapon of choice," said Harithoel, quietly, <mark>watching</mark> his prey and missing another with a splash and a curse...
"S'Riizh <mark>watches</mark> though," said S'Riizh. "You'd be surprised how much you...
.... "You'd be surprised how much you can learn just by <mark>watching</mark>. Don't forget the fifth crate over by the tree."...
...he saw Vanis Coribael, the youngest of the brothers, <mark>watching</mark> the valley for intruders. Vanis was known to be faster...
Saint Delyn the Wise <mark>watched</mark> the young adventurer from a cloud in the sky, and...
...to Caldera. Between Ald'ruhn and Caldera are many sidepaths; <mark>watch</mark> for signposts, or you'll get lost. The silt strider...
...that all they think and do is under the ever-<mark>watchful</mark> eye of the Tribunal and family ancestor spirits...."
